users.about: The Land Portal is the global gateway for land related information, aggregating information on land from multiple sources and building a specialized community of land experts from civil society organisations, governmental and intergovernmental institutions and academia. It is the result of a partnership of many organizations.
users.name: landportal

description: The Land Data group is a collaborative platform to collect sources of information about land-related issues for the Land Portal (http://landportal.info). We invite you to help us improve this collection of databases!
name: land-data
title: Land Data
